lines.p:
Jehovah is my Shepherd.
I will lack nothing.
In grassy pastures he makes me lie down;He leads me to well-watered resting-places.

He refreshes me.
He leads me in the paths of righteousness for the sake of his name.
Though I walk in the valley of deep shadow,I fear no harm,For you are with me;Your rod and your staff reassure me.

You prepare a table for me before my enemies.
You refresh my head with oil;My cup is well-filled.
Surely goodness and loyal love will pursue me all the days of my life,And I will dwell in the house of Jehovah for all my days.
